TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegionData extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the data that makes up a object. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. The code performs the following actions:
- Creates a rectangle and draw its to the screen in black.
- Creates a region using the rectangle.
- Gets the RegionData.
- Draws the region data (an array of bytes) to the screen, by using the DisplayRegionData helper function.
[!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicRegionExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Data { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };
member this.Data : byte[] with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Gets or sets an array of bytes that specify the object.
Docs.value: An array of bytes that specify the object.

remarks.format:
## Examples
- The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>`e`, which is a parameter of the `Paint` event handler. The code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData.Data%2A> from one <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData> object to set the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData.Data%2A> for another <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.RegionData>.
[!code-cpp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#13)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/CS/form1.cs#13)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.MiscExamples#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.MiscExamples/VB/form1.vb#13)]
